name: ECHO CHAMBER (Eric)
description:
Love is blind! Guide the discs through the maze to unite them in the portal to the next level.

Use WASD (or left stick) to move the Blue disc, and arrow keys (or right stick) to move the right disc.

Use left and right Shift (or left and right triggers) to echo the path for the other disc.

Unite both discs in the portal to move to the next level.

GitHub repo: https://github.com/spaghettioh/brackeys-game-jam
